text: @WhiteHouse @PressSec But not the 100,000 Coronavirus victims.  Forget about them.  They are not important to the Donald Trump re-election campaign.  We will never forget them, Mr. President.  They are our wives and mothers, they are our friends and loved ones.  You are incompetent!  Resign!
